Instructions: Before running the application, copy this file to testdata.json and update all values below.
tenantId: <Directory (tenant) ID for SampleApp in test organization>
refreshToken: <Refresh token obtained from Postman using Device Code auth flow>
chatId: <Chat id used for generating mock received messages>
mockMessageSenderId: <User id used as sender when generating mock received messages>
mockMessageSenderName: <Name used for sender when generating mock received messages>
